originalText.text: Lived at Arabella for 2 years and recommend it to anyone looking for a convenient, friendly and fun place to live in east village (with amenities!). 1 block from the east river and the night life on Ave C and the best restaurants around Tompkins Square Park. The Building manager, Frank is a legend and more of a friend than a Super and comes through when you need him. Great Apt to be in.

text.text: Lived at Arabella for 2 years and recommend it to anyone looking for a convenient, friendly and fun place to live in east village (with amenities!). 1 block from the east river and the night life on Ave C and the best restaurants around Tompkins Square Park. The Building manager, Frank is a legend and more of a friend than a Super and comes through when you need him. Great Apt to be in.

originalText.text: Starting my third year here as a tenant. Living here has shaped my experience living in NYC. Our apartment feels very much like home, and waking up to views of the empire state and one world trade never gets old. The outdoor space is fantastic. Gym is also excellent for the building size. Even more than the space or amenities, the people are what make this place special. This place is a vibrant community and is cared for by the best building manager Frank that one could ask for. Frank has been my lifeline when I need any type of help with the apartment. He pours his heart and soul into his work, and is the literal human walking form of Santa.

originalText.text: The super/building manager here goes above and beyond to ensure his tenants get the best experience. Facilities are always clean and in order. Frank, the current Super/building manager, has always fixed or given an update on when repairs will take place almost instantly when reported via the internal maintenance portal. Best place we’ve lived in NYC yet!

text.text: The super/building manager here goes above and beyond to ensure his tenants get the best experience. Facilities are always clean and in order. Frank, the current Super/building manager, has always fixed or given an update on when repairs will take place almost instantly when reported via the internal maintenance portal. Best place we’ve lived in NYC yet!

originalText.text: Arabella deserves a 5/5 rating for its constant cleanliness, gym amenities, and generally speaking, managements dedication to making this the best possible living experience for its tenants. I’ve lived in three different apartments in the city and this is by far the best building. The super goes above and beyond to make sure all the tenants needs are met and even does so on holidays (we had drainage problems on thanksgiving and he came to fix it not even an hour after we submitted the request). Not to mention, the rooftop is absolutely stunning with an incredible view of the entire city. And that’s an understatement. The super even added an herb garden for everyone to enjoy !!

originalText.text: Beautiful building with the best super/building manager - Frank. Frank is very responsive and friendly. Great amenities; gym, roof top with grill, bike parking and laundry room. Also in a great neighborhood close to many restaurants, bars, community gardens and parks.
